modName: 83Willows WHITER TEETH 4all - Orc Khajiit Argonian Werewolf
summary:
Brighter, more beautiful, natural TEETH Colors - for all NPCs and player-characters! :D

(+ nicer, healthy tongue/mouth colors) for ALL default Skyrim-RACES (including WEREWOLFS and VAMPIRES)
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://farm1.staticflickr.com/933/29075571947_c85e548d4c_o.jpg[/img]
My try to improve the looks of all Skyrim-Races (+ Werewolfs + Vampires) by making their TEETH a bit brighter and more beautiful.
For all NPCs ingame and of course your character too! :)
Maybe not 100% lore-friendly but much nicer to look at than the yellow, green, and grey default teeth!
I really tried to make the teeth natural looking (not bleached) - and also attemted to improve the overall tongue/mouth-colors!

[b][color=lightgreen]NEWS: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2689072]zzjay[/url] uploaded a wonderful HD-Retexture for Human Teeth > [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34346]Smile in HD[/url] I higly recommend using it > install my mod first and then let her textures overwrite mine - this way you get the best combination from both mods - and beautiful teeth for all races :)[/color][/b]


This mod is compatible with almost all other mods - even werewolf-recolors
(because most of them do not include teeth-recolors)! If you are asked to overwrite any files klick YES!
(the only mod that is [b]incompatible[/b] is [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33117]Realistic Teeth[/url] because it adds completely new teeth meshes)

Download and install manually or with the NMM (the file is also packed BAIN-friendly!).


[img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p483/8383Willow/Feedback_lightgreen.jpg[/img]
. . . (comments, uploaded images, constructive critizism, . . .)


[img]https://c6.staticflickr.com/8/7398/27189746141_40661226c3_o.jpg[/img]
Orcs - the most visible improvement - because you can see their (big) teeth all the time! I made their teeth brighter and their tongue less red.

[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/8/7276/27161944832_36fb563292_o.jpg[/img]
Human and Elf-Races: Only slight improvements - their teeth already looked quite nice, and most of the time they are not really visible (even while talking!)

[b][color=lightgreen]NEWS: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2689072]zzjay[/url] uploaded a wonderful HD-Retexture for Human Teeth > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34346]Smile in HD[/url] I higly recommend using it > install my mod first and then let her textures overwrite mine - this way you get the best combination from both mods - and beautiful teeth for all races :)[/color][/b]

[img]https://c4.staticflickr.com/8/7547/26653513363_81f31692c2_o.jpg[/img]
Vampire (all RACES): when turned into a vampire the teeth-mesh changes - but will still use my improved teeth+mouth textures for all races! :)

[img]https://c5.staticflickr.com/8/7006/27161945052_abef96bdaf_o.jpg[/img]
Khajiit - Much lighter overall mouth-color, brighter teeth and better tongue-color.

[img]https://c3.staticflickr.com/8/7528/27161944922_83196e7c97_o.jpg[/img]
Argonian - Brighter teeth and much improved mouth+tongue-color. No more sickly pale and spotted tongues!

[img]https://c2.staticflickr.com/8/7673/26653513553_5040041a26_o.jpg[/img]
Werewolf - A bit lighter mouth+tongue, whiter teeth and a bit softer overall textures.


:)

I really hope you enjoy my teeth and tongue recolors!



Visit my profile [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/938388]83Willow[/url] for more infos, mods and screenshots - and check out my other mods here:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18204][img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/8/7258/27225546856_ed1e6553cb_o.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4955][img]https://c8.staticflickr.com/8/7759/27259267735_556802ba93_o.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16000][img]https://c6.staticflickr.com/8/7376/27189727341_f4d42f6a91_o.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4762][img]https://c5.staticflickr.com/8/7116/27225546676_f99a8d6e88_o.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11371][img]https://c4.staticflickr.com/8/7516/27189727171_b996c6207b_o.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5865][img]https://c3.staticflickr.com/8/7563/27225546746_bd80569ba7_o.jpg[/img][/url]
author: 83Willow
